item.title: [NT] Little Ashish's Huge Donation
item.description: Source of problem: HackerRank. 1. Summary of Problem Statement To briefly summarise, there are $T\leq 10^5$ test cases. For each test case, we are given an integer $X\leq 10^{16}$. We are required to calculate the largest integer $n$ such that the sum of (square of each integer $\leq n$) is at most $X$. 2. First approach Testing. $\sum_{i=1}^n i=\frac{n(n+1)}{2}$. 3. Lagrange Interpolation If you haven’t read my blog yet, please go on codeforces.
